snippet.title: Sam & Max - Reality 2.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
The full season is available now on XBLA and PC/Mac!

XBLA: http://bit.ly/kMEcH9
PC/Mac: http://bit.ly/Z7JawG

Sam & Max Season 1: Episode 5 - Reality 2.0

With an internet crisis looming and a viral video game holding its players hostage, Sam & Max will need to slip into a new reality to set things right. But can the Freelance Police crack this virtual case in time to avoid worldwide system failure?


Website:http://www.telltalegames.com/samandmax
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/telltalegames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/telltalegames
